display_long_description:
MemoryON is a sound-based memory game.
Access the floating spheres in space, listen to their sounds, and try to remember them. Find the spheres that produce matching sounds to form pairs and clear them from the field.
When you hear a sound you've encountered before, it will resonate, revealing its location through audio cues.
Be cautious—if you make a mistake, the spheres will start to deteriorate. Aim to complete the game with as few accesses as possible.

Sharpen your hearing, clear all the spheres, and strive for perfection!

Game Rules
- Match pairs of spheres that produce the same sound to clear them from the space.
- In a single turn, the player can access two spheres.
- If the accessed spheres produce the same sound, the pair will disappear.
- The game is cleared when all the spheres in the space are removed.

Sphere Features
- When you access a sphere that you’ve heard before, it will resonate and reveal the location of its matching pair when the first sphere is accessed.
- Making an incorrect match causes the spheres to deteriorate, and repeated mistakes will result in the spheres collapsing.
- You can replay the sound of a sphere, but only on the first move of your turn.
